snippet: An indictment charged Elliot Morales with murder as a hate crime in the death of a man whom he allegedly taunted with antigay slurs before shooting him in Greenwich Village.
abstract: Elliot Morales is charged with murder as a hate crime in death of Mark Carson, whom he allegedly taunted with antigay slurs before shooting him in Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: An indictment charged Elliot Morales with murder as a hate crime in the death of a man whom he allegedly taunted with antigay slurs before shooting him in Greenwich Village.

headline.main: Gunman Boasted of Killing Man He Taunted With Antigay Slurs, the Police Say
headline.print_headline: Gunman Boasted of Killing Man He Taunted With Antigay Slurs, the Police Say
